tier.item: (7) Án kisa va'a ra síni yó'o?
(7) Án kisa va'a ra síni yó'o?
Án kisa va'a ra síni yó'o?
`Let's see if he comes or not (but I doubt it).'
(8) Ná koto yó tá kixaa ra, ni'.
`Let's see if he comes or not (but I doubt it).'
Ná koto yó tá kixaa ra, ni'.
Let's see if he comes or not (but I doubt it).

item.children: w-ps1 w-ps2 w-ps3 w-ps4 w-ps5 w-ps6 w-ps7 w-ps14

tier.item: `They'll stay another day, they say (or someone says).'
`They'll stay another day, they say (or someone says).'
They'll stay another day, they say (or someone says).
`He wanted to go home yesterday, but he didn't.'
(11) Kóni ra no'o ra koni, nikúu.
`He wanted to go home yesterday, but he didn't.'
Kóni ra no'o ra koni, nikúu.
He wanted to go home yesterday, but he didn't.
`Who in the world is that man?'
`Who in the world is that man?'
Who in the world is that man?
